name: Her Heart In A Porcelain Jar
name_original: Her Heart In A Porcelain Jar
description:
Where is Joanna Decanter, and where is her heart?

Take a walk in this suburban emo sadventure thought by Evey Lockhart and brought to life by Spooky Jaguar International. Besides the adventure, the game includes 5 characters, 5 places and 3 encounters, ready to be added to your Troika! game.
